arts.ttl: GdS: ‘Different giants’ – the ownership models of Juventus and Milan compared
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Juventus and AC Milan remain elite forces in Italian football, but their ownerships come from very different worlds. La Gazzetta dello Sport write that for decades, Juventus-Milan embodied Italy’s industrial spirit, with the recognisable and media-driven faces of Gianni Agnelli and Silvio Berlusconi. It was a different Serie A, a different kind of football. The […] The post GdS: ‘Different giants’ – the ownership models of Juventus and Milan compared appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Gazzetta: Juventus without Gleison Bremer in match vs AC Milan
arts.sum: One bad and one good piece of news for Juventus ahead of tonight’s big match against Milan. According to La Gazzetta dello Sport, coach Igor Tudor will be without Gleison Bremer, who is still dealing with knee discomfort. After missing the Champions League match against Villarreal, he will also sit out the home clash against […]

arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher It should be the battle of the three-man defences at the Allianz Stadium tonight as Juventus host AC Milan. Milan go into the game in good form, having won five on the spin across all competitions, but also in good health.
